EmailTemplate.description: This is used to send is when Insurance licenses are about to expire within 10/20 days
EmailTemplate.name: Insurance Expiration Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Request URGENT: Your Insurance info for the Lease Program needs updating
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Business_Registration__c.Account__c},
Thank you for participating in the SunPower Lease Program and for your investment in changing the way the world is powered.
One of the requirements of the Lease Program is to keep your enrollment information up to date. As such, one or more of the fields below are expired, expiring, or incomplete:
General Liability Expiry: {!Business_Registration__c.Site_General_Liability_Exp__c} Auto Coverage Expiry: {!Business_Registration__c.Automotive_Expiration_Date__c} Workers Comp Expiry: {!Business_Registration__c.Site_Worker_Comp_Exp__c} Build Risk Expiry: {!Business_Registration__c.Builders_Risk_Expiration__c}
Failure to comply with the requirements shall result in the following process a) we will remove your ability to lock a lease, and b) after communication with you, your continued participation in the lease program may be terminated.
WHAT YOU NEED TO DO:
If any fields are blank, it means we do not have that information on file, and request you send it to us by replying to this email If the date shown is close to expiry, or expired, then we ask that you provide updated information as soon as possible. We are unable to ship you product if we have incomplete or expired Insurance information
WHERE TO GET HELP:
INSURANCE (ACORD)
Attached is the Lease 2 0 Insurance Requirements. You can also view this document in your signed Lease Contract. Any of these documents will help you identify what is required and how to submit
NOTE: If any insurance is expired, we cannot ship Leased product to you
NOTE: Build Risk is for $50k (minimum). It is also known as ‘Installation Floater’ or ‘Inland Marine’ depending on your geography
NOTE: SunPower must be named on each policy and in the Certificate Holder section of the ACORD format. Please use the following address:
SunPower Corporation 1414 Harbour Way South Richmond, CA 94804 Attn: Projects Administrator
NOTE: The company that provides your policy must be A- (Class 9) or better
Please send all documents to ResidentialAmericasCompliance@sunpowercorp.com and copy your Operational Coordinator/PSR.
Thank you for your attention to this email.
SunPower Team
ResidentialAmericasCompliance@sunpowercorp.com
